text: You've heard that the law said5:21. Literally, “You've heard that it was said.” This phrase is used often in this passage by Jesus to refer to the laws found in the Old Testament. to the people of long ago: ‘You shall not murder, and anyone who commits murder will be condemned as guilty.’5:21. Or “liable to judgment.” Exodus 20:13 or Deuteronomy 5:17.
